title: Wrong server/region
body:
Hi I recently started playing lol 2 or 3 days ago and I realised I was on the wrong server/region. I live in Ireland and I was hoping if there was a way to transfer my account from north america to Ireland/Europe west.

Would appreciate the help, thanks.

replies.body: There definitely is an option to transfer your account to a new server, but those transfers do cost some in-game currency and they're currently disabled due to some errors. Since you're only level 8 so far, it might be a decent option to forgo transferring and just create a new account on the server where you needed it to be! Otherwise, feel free to watch [**this post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) for more details on when those transfers will be back up.
